name: Amount of daily dose of folic acid prescribed
title: Amount of daily dose of folic acid prescribed
description: Amount of folic acid supplements prescribed in milligrams for daily intake

element.short: Amount of daily dose of folic acid prescribed
element.comment: This information is needed for every contact regardless of whether the woman is diagnosed with anaemia or if she is just taking nutritional supplements to prevent an anaemia diagnosis

code.display: Amount of daily dose of folic acid prescribed (SNOMED-CT)
